nodes.text: The Hynestian royal fleet was a fleet possessed by the royal family of the planet Hynestia. When attempting to escape Hynestia to return the Solstice Globe to Livno III with the Lynna Zel Gris, the smuggler Lando Calrissian and his droid partner L3-37, Princess Rinetta Gan switched the fleet's security codes, preventing its starships from flying. As the group left Hynestia, they were pursued by forces of Ne'eda's Stalwarts, who L3-37 initially believed were the Hynestian royal fleet.
